channel.title: About the blog category
channel.description:
A lot of cregox's ramblings and somewhat incoherent thoughts very much shaped by the brazilian culture. (There are more posts on the [portuguese category][1]).
Only staff members can create new topics here, about anything. Anyone can talk about it.
Some older topics came earlier, some came later. They're all from either of the [older blog][2] or the [even older one][3]. *For now* the new ones shall be all originated straight from here. Sorry for the mess, pay attention to the details! ;)
Eventually this may migrate to [a new blog](http://blog.cregox.com) or, *just maybe*, the new space might get merged into here, [using plugins](https://meta.discourse.org/t/sams-blog-plugin/12656?u=cregox) and [a better "discourse tool"](/talk/t/discourse-is-way-too-much-about-censorship/7802).
[1]: /c/portuguese/blog [2]: http://cregox.com/blog [3]: http://cauecmrego.blogspot.com

item.title: About the blog category
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego

A lot of cregox's ramblings and somewhat incoherent thoughts very much shaped by the brazilian culture. (There are more posts on the portuguese category).

Only staff members can create new topics here, about anything. Anyone can talk about it.

Some older topics came earlier, some came later. They're all from either of the older blog or the even older one. For now the new ones shall be all originated straight from here. Sorry for the mess, pay attention to the details!
